bull roarer
-
a thin blade of wood which makes a loud thrumming
sound when whirled on a cord. Its use in aborigine
ceremonies warns off women and the uninitiated.

-

point a bone
-
aboriginal projective magic. A prepared human or
kangaroo bone is pointed by a sorcerer at an intended
victim (who may be miles away) to bring about his death.
